page.title: 18The Duke of Norfolk.
page.content: The Duke of Norfolk is a familiar face in our area.The Duke served in the army for 30 years and he has met the Royal Family,Montgomery,Churchill and General Eisenhower.He started at the bottom of the ladder and worked his way up to the rank of Major General. After 30 years in the services,the Duke went to the war office in London then he quit the army for good. I feel very honoured to have a man who has done so much for his country living not half a mile away from me. The Duke has been a lord for 10 years now, ever since his brother died in 1975.Before embarking on his army career the Duke was a Woodpigeon in the scouts. He has a castle called Arundel but this is now a museum. He loves Yorkshire and England and he enjoys living in Hambleden.
